basic.description:
This course examines the history of sexuality in a comparative context, using Canada, Britain and the United States in the 19th and 20th centuries as a focus.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The History of Sexuality

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
